txt.en: Tell Gadda of your successes in Stangard

'It is good that Stanric has given you leave to do as you will. If only I had that liberty....\n\n'Ah well. Sabert and Tatwine are good men... and better yet, are not loyal to Sithric. They will accept your help more readily than the others if you wish to lend aid.'
'You are an admirable [placeholder], [placeholder]! I wish Sithric had the wisdom to see what good could be done here if only he stepped out of our way!'
'Sabert guards the north gate, and you will find Tatwine at the stable.'
Stanric has given you leave to do as you will in Stangard.
Help Tatwine to better tend the horses

Sabert guards the north gate of Stangard, and Tatwine tends the stable near the Mead Hall, in Eorlsmead.\n\nYou should assist Sabert and Tatwine with anything they might need that can be done without interference from Sithric.
Help Sabert deal with the threat of vicious dogs in the plains
Gadda is near the Mead Hall in Stangard.
